SEARCH
Module com.example.demo
Package com.example.demo.utils

Class ImageProperties

java.lang.Object
com.example.demo.utils.ImageProperties
public class ImageProperties extends Object
ImageProperties class is an utility class for applying properties to ImageView. ImageProperties class provides methods to set various properties of ImageView, such as position, size, and aspect ratio.

  • Method Details

    • applyProperties

      public static void applyProperties(javafx.scene.image.ImageView imageView, javafx.scene.image.Image image, Double xPosition, Double yPosition, Integer height, Double width, Boolean preserveRatio)
      Applies set of properties to ImageView.
      Parameters:
      imageView - : ImageView to which properties will be applied.
      image - : Image to set on ImageView.
      xPosition - : X position of ImageView.
      yPosition - : Y position of ImageView.
      height - : height of ImageView.
      width - : width of ImageView.
      preserveRatio - : the boolean indicating whether to preserve aspect ratio of image.

    • setImage

      public static void setImage(javafx.scene.image.ImageView imageView, javafx.scene.image.Image image)
      Sets image of ImageView.
      Parameters:
      imageView - : ImageView to which the image will be set.
      image - : Image to set on ImageView.

    • setLayoutX

      public static void setLayoutX(javafx.scene.image.ImageView imageView, Double xPosition)
      Sets X position of ImageView.
      Parameters:
      imageView - : ImageView to which X position will be set.
      xPosition - : X position to set.

    • setLayoutY

      public static void setLayoutY(javafx.scene.image.ImageView imageView, Double yPosition)
      Sets Y position of ImageView.
      Parameters:
      imageView - : ImageView to which Y position will be set.
      xPosition - : Y position to set.

    • setPreserveRatio

      public static void setPreserveRatio(javafx.scene.image.ImageView imageView, Boolean preserveRatio)
      Sets whether aspect ratio of image should be preserved.
      Parameters:
      imageView - : ImageView to which preserve ratio setting will be applied.
      preserveRatio - : the boolean indicating whether to preserve aspect ratio.
